document.text:
Subject: Re: 
Epstein case 
Date: Tue, 05 Jan 2021 18:33:26 +0000 
Inline-Images: image001.gif 
I'll handle. Thanks. 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Jan 5, 2021, at 1:17 PM, ) wrote: 
Apologies, I  forgot to pass this along earlier, but this Norwegian reporter got my email address from the law 
school where I teach a workshop, and sent me this request. 
Sent from my iPhone 
Forwarded message
From: Tore Gjerstad 
Date: Tue, Jan 5, 2021 at 5:58 AM 
Subject: VS: Epstein case 
To: 
Dear 
Have you had time to consider this request? 
Best regards, 
Tore 
Fra: Tore Gjerstad 
Sendt: onsdag 16. desember 2020 11:28 
Til: 
Emne: Epstein case 
Dear 
I'm an investigative reporter at The Norwegian Business Daily in Oslo, (Dagens Nwringsliv). We have been 
writing about Jeffrey Epstein's political connections for a year, among them revealing how he managed to get 
Bill Gates through the doors of the Nobel Peace Prize committee's leader in 2013. But our main target has 
EFTA00030938

been the former UN assistant Secretary General, Mr. Terje Rod-Larsen, who resigned as president of the 
International Peace Institute in New York, after we revealed his financial dealings with Epstein. I'm attaching 
our translated articles. 
The reason why I'm writing to You is that I see You were on the team at SDNY prosecuting him. And I've 
heard that You reached out to some of the people who were on Epstein's flight log in recent years. I would be 
grateful if we could exchange background information that might help us in our further investigation. We 
have reason to believe that both Mr. Rod-Larsen and his wife Mona Juul were on his plane one time during 
Christmas to Epstein's island in the years 2010-2015. 
I'm sorry for reaching out to You on this email, but I couldn't find one at the SDNY website. 
Here are 
some of our 40 articles: 
https://www.dn.no/politikk/intemational-peace-institute/terje-rod-larsen/jeffrey-epstein/norwegian-
newspaper-dn-reveals-diplomat-terje-rod-larsen-owed-jeffrey-epstein-130000/2-1-891702 
https://www.dn.no/politikk/terje-rod-larsen/bill-gates/jeffrey-epstein/behind-the-scenes-how-jeffrey-epstein-
helped-billionaire-bill-gates-fund-un-affiliated-think-tank-projects/2-1-885697 
https://www.dn.no/magasinet/dokumentar/jeffrey-epstein/thorbjom-jagland/terje-rod-larsen/bill-gates-and-
jeffrey-epstein-met-with-nobel-committee-chair/2-1-885834 
https://www.dn.no/politikk/jeffrey-epstein/terje-rod-larsen/mona-juul/jeffrey-epstein-funded-special-
performance-of-tony-award-winning-play-for-the-un-community/2-1-918850 
Best regards, 
Tore Gjerstad 
Political reporter 
The Norwegian Business Daily 
Mobil: 
DagensNaffingsliv 
EFTA00030939
